resources.string: Your favourite restaurant makes it even better by making it easier for you to order food.
Afghan House is a the first and best food house offering all your tasty Middle Eastern recipes here in Nairobi. Visit us at The Hub Karen.
Please check your Internet connection and try again
Application is out of date, please update to get latest version
Please check your Internet connection and try again
Comment \n\n This may include your preferred delivery time
Are you sure want to checkout this order?
Oops, Failed to checkout order. \n\nMake sure you have an internet connection, or if you need help please Contact Us from Settings

Successfully checkout order.
Your order code : %1$s

 Your order will be reviewed soon and when ready a notification will be sent to your phone.A delivery fee will be charged based on location.

 Areas within the nairobi region will be charged KSH 300 and KSH 500 for all areas on the outskirts.

string-array.name: about_description_array
string-array.item: Afghan House is your go to restaurant for Middle Eastern recipes\nSomething for Everyone
Search Latest and Featured Recipes\nWith Best Prices
Add to your Basket All Foods You like\nAnd Checkout your Orders
We Will Verify Your Order\nPay the Bill and Enjoy your food

The Big Zoo Ke Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

 1. Terms
 By accessing the website at http://bigzoo.co, you are agreeing to be bound by these terms of service, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this website are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law. 
2. Use License
Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on The Big Zoo Ke's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not: modify or copy the materials; use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial); attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on The Big Zoo Ke's website; remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server. This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by The Big Zoo Ke at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.
 3. Disclaimer

The materials on The Big Zoo Ke's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. The Big Zoo Ke makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights. Further, The Big Zoo Ke does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.
 4. Limitations

In no event shall The Big Zoo Ke or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on The Big Zoo Ke's website, even if The Big Zoo Ke or a The Big Zoo Ke authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

5. Accuracy of materials 
 The materials appearing on The Big Zoo Ke's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. The Big Zoo Ke does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete or current. The Big Zoo Ke may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice. However The Big Zoo Ke does not make any commitment to update the materials. 
 6. Links 
 The Big Zoo Ke has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by The Big Zoo Ke of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk. 
 7. Modifications 
 The Big Zoo Ke may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service. 
 8. Governing Law 
 These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Nairobi, Kenya and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that State or location. 

 Privacy Policy 
 Your privacy is important to us. 
 It is The Big Zoo Ke's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect while operating our website. Accordingly, we have developed this privacy policy in order for you to understand how we collect, use, communicate, disclose and otherwise make use of personal information. We have outlined our privacy policy below. 
 We will collect personal information by lawful and fair means and, where appropriate, with the knowledge or consent of the individual concerned. Before or at the time of collecting personal information, we will identify the purposes for which information is being collected. We will collect and use personal information solely for fulfilling those purposes specified by us and for other ancillary purposes, unless we obtain the consent of the individual concerned or as required by law. Personal data should be relevant to the purposes for which it is to be used, and, to the extent necessary for those purposes, should be accurate, complete, and up-to-date. We will protect personal information by using reasonable security safeguards against loss or theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification. We will make readily available to customers information about our policies and practices relating to the management of personal information. We will only retain personal information for as long as necessary for the fulfilment of those purposes. We are committed to conducting our business in accordance with these principles in order to ensure that the confidentiality of personal information is protected and maintained. The Big Zoo Ke may change this privacy policy from time to time at The Big Zoo Ke's sole discretion.
